actions.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 242 (Roll no. 445).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 242 (Roll no. 445).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 114-204 to fund water reclamation programs and water reuse projects so that the Bureau of Reclamation may investigate more opportunities to reclaim and reuse wastewater and naturally impaired ground and surface water in the 17 Western states and Hawaii.
purpose: Amendment sought to fund water reclamation programs and water reuse projects so that the Bureau of Reclamation may investigate more opportunities to reclaim and reuse wastewater and naturally impaired ground and surface water in the 17 Western states and Hawaii.
